articles.author: Christine Ji, Britney Nguyen
articles.title: What are the hottest tech stocks for 2026? Here’s what ChatGPT and Gemini had to say. - MarketWatch
articles.description: MarketWatch asked the leading LLMs for their top stock picks — but the answers suggest AI may be following the herd instead of truly reasoning
articles.content:
In order to achieve artificial general intelligence, or AGI, a machine must be able to match or exceed human abilities in learning and applying knowledge.
While the technology isnt quite there yet a… [+385 chars]
